      • startServer

        public void startServer(int serverPort,
               int chunkBuffer)
        Start the File Receiver Server
        Parameters:
        serverPort - the port to listen (default 3333)
        chunkBuffer - the size of chunk data. Warning: This value must be the same found in Teapot configuration.

      • beginTransaction

        public String beginTransaction()
                        throws Exception
        Start a transaction in Sagitarii File Cache to receive data from Node
        Returns:
        "ok" or "error"
        Throws:
        Exception - if error.

      • forceStopAndCancel

        public void forceStopAndCancel(String sessionSerial)
                        throws Exception
        Stop all Savers from this session and clear the cache. This will delete all files received.
        Parameters:
        sessionSerial - the session that will be forced to stop
        Throws:
        Exception

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a list of FileSavers from that session

      • commit

        public void commit(String sessionSerial)
            throws Exception
        Commit a session. Send all files to the files table and import CSV data to target table.
        Parameters:
        sessionSerial - the session to commit. Must be idle (no active transfers).
        Throws:
        in - case of error
        Exception
